PerkData.Name: Ace in the Hole
PerkData.Description:
Lady Luck always seems to be throwing something good your way.

When retrieving an item from a chest, there is a {0}% chance that a Visceral (or lower) add-on will be attached to it.

{1}% chance of finding a second add-on of Uncommon rarity (or lower).

When escaping, keep any add-ons your item has.

PerkData.Name: Adrenaline
PerkData.Description:
You are fuelled by unexpected energy when on the verge of escape.

This perk activates when the exit gates are powered.

Instantly heal one health state if you are injured or in the dying state and gain {0}% Haste for {1} seconds.

Adrenaline ignores the Exhausted status effect. Causes the Exhausted status effect for {2} seconds.

Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

PerkData.Name: Aftercare
PerkData.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability.

You see the aura of every Survivor that:

  • You rescue from a hook, or rescues you from a hook;
  • You complete a healing action on, or completes a healing action on you.


    • They also see your aura.

    This occurs for up to {0} Survivors. All effects of Aftercare are reset when you are hooked by The Killer.

PerkData.Name: Agitation
PerkData.Description:
You get excited in anticipation of hooking your prey.

While transporting a body, your Terror Radius is increased by {1} meters and you have {0}% Haste.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.

PerkData.Name: Alert
PerkData.Description:
Your acute senses are on high alert.

When the Killer performs a break action, the Killer is revealed to you for {0} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Any Means Necessary
PerkData.Description:
You stand up for yourself, using whatever's on hand to gain an advantage.

You see the auras of dropped Pallets.
  • Press and hold the Active Ability Button 1 for {0} seconds while standing beside a dropped pallet to reset it to its upright position.

PerkData.Name: Autodidact
PerkData.Description:
You start the trial with a -{1}% progress penalty for Skill Checks to heal other Survivors.

For every successful Skill Check while healing another Survivor, you receive a token up to a maximum of {0} tokens.

Each token grants you a +{2}% progress bonus.

Great Skill Checks cannot be performed while using Autodidact.
  • Autodidact is not active when using a Med-kit to heal.

PerkData.Name: Babysitter
PerkData.Description:
While you have a reputation for being self-centered, you risk it all to help those in need.

When you unhook a Survivor, they won't leave scratch marks or pools of blood, and they gain a {0}% Haste status effect for {1} seconds.

You see the Killer's aura for {2} seconds.

Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

PerkData.Name: Balanced Landing
PerkData.Description:
Your agility is incomparable.

After falling from a height, cat-like reflexes reduce your stagger duration from falling by {0}% and reduce the volume of grunts from falling by 100%. You gain {1}% Haste for a maximum of {2} seconds.

Causes the Exhausted status effect for {3} seconds.

Balanced Landing cannot be used while Exhausted.

Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

PerkData.Name: Bamboozle
PerkData.Description:
Your vault speed is {0}% faster.

Performing a vault action calls upon The Entity to block that vault location to Survivors for {1} seconds.

Only 1 vault location may be blocked in this way at any time.

Does not affect pallets.

PerkData.Name: Barbecue & Chili
PerkData.Description:
A deep bond with The Entity unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability.
  • After hooking a Survivor, all other Survivors' auras are revealed to you for {0} seconds when they are further than {1} meters from the hook.

PerkData.Name: Beast of Prey
PerkData.Description:
Your lust for a kill is so intense that your connection with The Entity is momentarily lost, making you totally unpredictable.

When you gain Bloodlust, gain Undetectable for {0} seconds.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

PerkData.Name: Better Together
PerkData.Description:
You seek justice and uncover the truth no matter what obstacle stands in your way.

The aura of the generator you are currently repairing is revealed to all other Survivors located within {0} meters.

If The Killer downs a Survivor while you are repairing a generator, you see the aura of all other Survivors for {1} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Bitter Murmur
PerkData.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Each time a generator is fully repaired, Survivors within {0} meters of the completed generator will be revealed for {1} seconds.

When the last generator is fully repaired, all the Survivors' auras are revealed for {2} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Blood Echo
PerkData.Description:
The agony of one is inflicted on others.

When hooking a Survivor, all injured Survivors suffer from the Hemorrhage\u00a0and Exhausted\u00a0status effects for {0}\u00a0seconds.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured Survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until healed.

PerkData.Name: Bloodhound
PerkData.Description:
Like a hunting scent hound, you smell traces of blood at a great distance.

Fresh blood marks are considerably more discernible than normal and can be tracked for {0} seconds longer than normal.

PerkData.Name: Blood Pact
PerkData.Description:
It's as if a latent part of yourself has awakened. You feel like you can reach out beyond yourself for assistance.

When you or the Obsession are injured, you both see each other's auras.

After completing a healing action on the Obsession, or having the Obsession complete a healing action on you, you both gain a {1}% Haste status effect until no longer within 16 meters of each other.

Reduces the odds of being the Obsession.

If you are the Obsession, this perk deactivates.

The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

PerkData.Name: Blood Warden
PerkData.Description:
As soon as an exit gate is opened, Blood Warden is activated. The auras of any Survivors located within Exit areas are revealed to you.

Once per match, hooking a Survivor while Blood Warden is active calls upon The Entity to block both Exits for all Survivors for\u00a0{0} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Boil Over
PerkData.Description:
You are a battler and do everything to escape a foe's grasp. Your struggling effects on The Killer are increased by {0}%.

You obscure The Killer's ability to see hook auras within {1} meters.

You gain {2} % of current wiggling progress when the Killer drops from great heights.

PerkData.Name: Bond
PerkData.Description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Allies' auras are revealed to you when they are within a {0} meter range.

PerkData.Name: Shattered Hope
PerkData.Description:
To capture your prey, you must first extinguish their hope.

Whenever you snuff a Boon Totem, the totem is destroyed instead.

When you destroy a Boon Totem this way, the auras of all Survivors inside the Boon Totem range are revealed to you for {0} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Borrowed Time
PerkData.Description:
You are fueled by unexpected energy when saving an ally from a hook.

Survivors you unhook:

  • Keep their Endurance status effect for an extra {0} seconds.
  • Retain their Haste for an extra 10 seconds.



    • Endurance prevents a Survivor from being downed, inflicting Deep Wound instead.

    Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

    Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

PerkData.Name: Botany Knowledge
PerkData.Description:
You transform plants found around the campfire into tinctures that slow down bleeding.

Healing speed is increased by {0}%.

PerkData.Name: Breakdown
PerkData.Description: Any time you are removed from a hook (escaped or saved), the hook breaks and the Killer's aura is shown to you for {0} seconds. A hook broken by this perk takes 180 seconds to respawn.

PerkData.Name: Breakout
PerkData.Description:
You kick into high gear when someone's in trouble, inspiring them to overcome any obstacle.

When within {0} meters of a carried Survivor, you gain {1}% Haste status effect. The carried Survivor's wiggle speed is increased by {2}%.

Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

PerkData.Name: Brutal Strength
PerkData.Description:
Your great strength allows you to shred through your prey's defenses.

Destroy dropped pallets, breakable walls, and generators {0}% faster.

PerkData.Name: Buckle Up
PerkData.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. While healing a Survivor in the dying state:

  • You both can see the Killer's aura.


    • When completing healing a Survivor from the dying state to injured:

  • The healed Survivor gains {0}% Haste for {1} seconds and leaves no scratch marks during this time.


    • Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

PerkData.Name: Built to Last
PerkData.Description:
You know how to get the most out of your tools.

After hiding inside a locker for {0} seconds with a depleted item in hand, {1}% of its charges are refilled.

Each use of Built to Last reduces the amounts of charges refilled by {2}%.

PerkData.Name: Calm Spirit
PerkData.Description:
Animals seem to trust you as they often stay calm in your presence.

  • Reduces chances of alerting woodland creatures by 100%.
  • Allows you to overcome the urge to scream.
  • Allows you to open chests and cleanse/bless Totems silently, but at {0}% reduced speed.

PerkData.Name: Camaraderie
PerkData.Description:
Life has taught you the importance of friendship which has given you strength.

While you are on the hook in the struggle phase, Camaraderie activates.

If another Survivor is within {0} meters of you while Camaraderie is activated, the hook timer is paused for {1} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Corrupt Intervention
PerkData.Description:
Your prayers invoke a dark power that meddles with the Survivors's chances of survival.

{0} generators located furthest from you are blocked by The Entity for {1} seconds at the start of the trial.

Survivors cannot repair these generators for the duration. Affected generators are highlighted by a white aura.

Corrupt Intervention\u00a0deactivates when any Survivor enters the dying state.

PerkData.Name: Coulrophobia
PerkData.Description:
Even those without a fear of clowns know to be terrified of you.

Survivors within your Terror Radius have a {0}% penalty to healing progression speed, and healing Skill Checks move 50% faster.

PerkData.Name: Cruel Limits
PerkData.Description:
Your ties to the otherworldly manifest when your prey attempts to get away.

Every time a generator is completed, all windows and vault locations are blocked for all Survivors for the next {0} seconds.

You see the aura of the vault locations blocked by Cruel Limits for the duration.

PerkData.Name: Dance With Me
PerkData.Description:
When performing a rushed vault or leaving a locker in a sprint, you leave no scratch marks for {0} seconds.

Dance With Me has a cooldown of {1} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Dark Sense
PerkData.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability.

Each time a generator is completed, Dark Sense activates.

While Dark Sense is active, the Killer entering a 24-meter radius around you reveals their aura for {0} seconds.

Once the aura's duration expires, Dark Sense deactivates.

PerkData.Name: Dark Devotion
PerkData.Description:
The display of your powers creates a whirlwind of panic that spreads throughout the land.

You become obsessed with one Survivor. When the Obsession loses a health state, your Terror Radius transfers to the Obsession for {1}\u00a0seconds, and its radius is set to {0}\u00a0meters.

You are granted the Undetectable status effect for the duration.

The Survivor with the transferred Terror Radius is also considered to be \inside the Terror Radius\ for other purposes.

The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

PerkData.Name: Dead Hard
PerkData.Description:
You can take a beating.

Dead hard activates after you are unhooked or unhook yourself.

When injured, tap into your adrenaline bank to avoid incoming damage. Press the Active Ability Button 1 while running to gain the Endurance status effect for the next 0.5 seconds.

  • Causes the Exhausted\u00a0status effect for {0} seconds.
  • Dead Hard then deactivates.


    • Endurance prevents a Survivor from being downed, inflicting Deep Wound instead.

    Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

    Exhausted prevents survivors from activating exhausting perks.

PerkData.Name: Dead Man's Switch
PerkData.Description:
When you hook a Survivor, Dead Man's Switch activates. The first Survivor that stops repairing a generator causes The Entity to block it for {0} seconds.

The affected generator is highlighted by a white aura.

Dead Man's Switch cannot reactivate while it is blocking a generator.

PerkData.Name: Deathbound
PerkData.Description:
Those whose lives are intertwined in darkness are destined to suffer together.

When a Survivor heals another Survivor, they scream and activate Deathbound. When the healer is farther than {0}\u00a0meters away from the Survivor they healed,\u00a0they suffer from the Oblivious status effect. This lasts until the healer loses a health state.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

PerkData.Name: Decisive Strike
PerkData.Description:
Stab at your aggressor in an attempt to escape.

After being unhooked or unhooking yourself, Decisive Strike activates for {0} seconds.

While active, complete a Skill Check when grabbed by the Killer to escape, stunning them for {1} seconds.
  • Succeeding or failing the Skill Check disables Decisive Strike.
  • You become the Obsession after stunning the Killer.
  • The perk and its effects are disabled if the exit gates are powered.


    • Increases your chance to be the Obsession.

    Taking any Conspicuous Action will deactivate Decisive Strike.

    The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

PerkData.Name: Deerstalker
PerkData.Description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Reveals dying Survivors' auras when standing within a {0} meter range.

PerkData.Name: Deja Vu
PerkData.Description:
The auras of 3 generators which are in close proximity to one another are revealed to you.

Gain a {0}% repair speed bonus on the revealed generators.

PerkData.Name: Deliverance
PerkData.Description:
After performing a safe hook rescue on another Survivor, Deliverance activates.

You now have a 100% chance of unhooking yourself during the escape attempt.

A successful Deliverance from the hook triggers the Broken status effect for {0} seconds.

Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

PerkData.Name: Desperate Measures
PerkData.Description:
You refuse to fail, even during your darkest hour.

For each injured, hooked, or dying Survivor, increase the speed of your healing and unhook actions by {0}%.

PerkData.Name: Detective's Hunch
PerkData.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. When a generator is completed, the auras of generators, chests and Totems within {0} meters are revealed to you for {1} seconds.

If you are holding a Map that can track objectives, generators, chests and Totems revealed by Detective's Hunch are added to the Map.

PerkData.Name: Discordance
PerkData.Description: Any generator within a range of {0} meters that is being repaired by two or more Survivors is marked by a yellow aura. When the generator is first highlighted, Discordance triggers a loud noise notification on the generator. After the generator is no longer within range or is no longer being repaired by two or more Survivors, the aura remains for another 4 seconds.

PerkData.Name: Distortion
PerkData.Description:
When your aura would be shown to the Killer, the perk activates.

Distortion starts with {0} token. When your aura would be read, Distortion activates and consumes a token. For the next {1} seconds, your aura and scratch marks will not be shown to The Killer. For each {2} seconds spent in chase, regain 1 token, up to {3}.

This effect cannot trigger while in the dying state.

PerkData.Name: Distressing
PerkData.Description:
Your horrifying emanation strikes at a supernaturally long distance.

Your Terror Radius is increased by {0}%.

PerkData.Name: Diversion
PerkData.Description:
Being within the Killer's Terror Radius while not in a chase for {0} seconds\u00a0activates Diversion.

  • Once Diversion is activated, press the Active Ability Button 1 while crouched and motionless to throw a pebble, which creates a distraction for The Killer at a distance of 20 meters.


  • The perk timer resets once the ability has been activated.


    • The distraction consists of:

  • A loud noise notification
  • Scratch marks

PerkData.Name: Dragon's Grip
PerkData.Description:
After damaging a generator, for the next {0} seconds, the first Survivor that interacts with it will scream, revealing their location for {1} seconds, and becoming afflicted with the Exposed status effect for {2} seconds.

Dragon's Grip has a cooldown of {3} seconds.

Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

PerkData.Name: Dying Light
PerkData.Description:
You become obsessed with one Survivor.

Your Obsession gains a {0}% action speed bonus to unhooking and healing other Survivors.

Each time you hook a Survivor other than the Obsession, if the Obsession is alive, gain a token.

If the Obsession is alive, all Survivors who are not the Obsession get {1}% penalty to repair, healing and sabotage speeds for each token.

The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

PerkData.Name: Empathy
PerkData.Description: Injured Survivors are revealed to you when within a {0} meter range.

PerkData.Name: Enduring
PerkData.Description:
You are resilient to pain.

You reduce the duration of pallet stuns by {0}%. Has no effect while carrying a Survivor.

PerkData.Name: Fire Up
PerkData.Description:
The increased pressure of losing your prey fills you with anger and gives you unsuspected motivation.

Each time the Survivors complete repairs on a generator, Fire Up grows in power.

  • For each generator completed, gain a {0}% stackable buff that grants a speed bonus to picking up, dropping, vaulting, damaging generators, and breaking pallets and breakable walls for the remainder of the trial.

PerkData.Name: Fixated
PerkData.Description:
When you have a goal in mind, there's no turning back: better to ask forgiveness than permission.

You can see your own scratch marks at all times.

While walking, you have {0}% Haste.

Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

PerkData.Name: Flip-Flop
PerkData.Description:
You have an uncanny ability to escape the inevitable.

While in dying state, {0}% of your recovery progression is converted into wiggle progression when you are picked up by The Killer, up to a maximum of {1}% total wiggle progression.

PerkData.Name: Forced Penance
PerkData.Description:
Those who stand in the way of duty will\u00a0suffer\u00a0harsh judgment.

Survivors\u00a0who take a protection hit are\u00a0inflicted with the Broken status effect for {0}\u00a0seconds.

Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

PerkData.Name: For the People
PerkData.Description:
You risk life and injury for others.

For the People is only active while at full health.

Press the Active Ability Button 1 while healing another Survivor without a Med-kit to instantly heal them from dying to injured, or from injured to healthy.

You become injured and receive the Broken status effect for {0} seconds.

You become the Obsession.

Equipping this perk decreases your chances of being The Killer's Obsession at the start of the trial.

The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

PerkData.Name: Franklin's Demise
PerkData.Description:
Your basic attacks make Survivors drop their item on impact. While on the ground, it takes up to {0} seconds for the item to lose all of its charges if it is not picked up.

Reveal items on the ground within {1} meters with a white aura. The Aura will slowly fade to red until the Item is empty of charges.

PerkData.Name: Furtive Chase
PerkData.Description:
You lurk in the shadows, eliminating your victims one by one.

You become obsessed with one Survivor. When your Obsession is hooked, gain the Undetectable status effect and a {0}% Haste status effect for {1} seconds.

When a Survivor rescues the Obsession from a hook, the rescuer becomes the Obsession.

The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.

PerkData.Name: Gearhead
PerkData.Description:
You've got an ear for\u00a0well-oiled gears.

After a survivor loses a health state by any means, Gearhead activates for {0} seconds.

While Gearhead is active, every time a Survivor performs a good Skill Check while repairing, their aura is revealed to you for {1} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Overcharge
PerkData.Description:
You are fuelled by your hate for progress.

Overcharge a generator by performing the Damage Generator action. The next Survivor interacting with that generator is faced with a difficult Skill Check. Failing the Skill Check results in an additional {0}% loss of progress.

Succeeding the Skill Check grants no progress but prevents the generator explosion.

After Overcharge is applied to a generator, its regression speed increases from 85% of normal to 130% of normal over the next 30 seconds.

PerkData.Name: Scourge Hook: Hangman's Trick
PerkData.Description:
Your ingenious modifications to hooks alert you of tampering.

At the start of the trial, 4 random hooks are changed into scourge hooks. You see their auras in white.

Gain a notification when a Survivor begins sabotaging a hook.

While carrying a Survivor, see the aura of any Survivor within {0} meters of a scourge hook.

PerkData.Name: Head On
PerkData.Description:
When your mind is set, there better be no one standing in your way.

While standing in a locker, for {0} seconds, Head On activates.

While Head On is activated, perform a rush action to leave a locker to use Head On. If The Killer is standing within Head On's effective range, The Killer is stunned for {1} seconds.

Causes the Exhausted\u00a0status effect for {2} seconds.

Head On cannot be used while Exhausted.

You do not recover from the Exhausted status effect while running.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

PerkData.Name: Hex: Devour Hope
PerkData.Description:
A Hex rooting its power on hope. The false hope of Survivors ignites your hunger.

When a Survivor is rescued from a hook at least 24 meters away, Devour Hope receives a token.

  • 2 Tokens: Gain a {0}% Haste status effect, 10 seconds after hooking a Survivor, for a duration of 10 seconds.
  • 3 Tokens: Survivors suffer from the Exposed status effect.
  • 5 Tokens: Grants the ability to kill Survivors by your own hand.


    • The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

    Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

    Haste increases Killer movement speed.

PerkData.Name: Hex: Haunted Ground
PerkData.Description:
Two trapped Hex Totems will spawn in the trial.

When either one of the two trapped Hex Totems is cleansed by a Survivor, all Survivors suffer from the Exposed status effect for {0} seconds.

The remaining trapped Hex Totem immediately becomes a Dull Totem.

Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

PerkData.Name: Hex: Huntress Lullaby
PerkData.Description:
A Hex rooting its power in despair. Your hunt is an irresistible song of dread which muddles your prey's attention.

Survivors receive a {0}% regression penalty when missing a Skill Check while healing or repairing.

Each time a Survivor is hooked, Huntress Lullaby grows in power. It affects healing and repairing Skill Check warnings:

  • 1 to 4 Tokens: Time between the Skill Check warning sound and the Skill Check becomes shorter.
  • 5 Tokens: No Skill Check warning.


    • The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

PerkData.Name: Hex: Ruin
PerkData.Description:
A Hex that affects all Survivors' generator repair progress.

All generators are affected by Hex: Ruin. While a generator is not being repaired by a Survivor, it will immediately and automatically regress repair progress at {0}% of the normal regression speed.

The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

PerkData.Name: Hex: The Third Seal
PerkData.Description:
A Hex that hinders one's aura reading ability.

Hitting a Survivor with a basic attack or a special attack while the Hex Totem is active applies the Blindness status effect. This effect applies to the last {0} Survivors hit.

The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

PerkData.Name: Hex: Thrill of the Hunt
PerkData.Description:
A Hex rooting its power on hope. The false hope of Survivors fills you with excitement and strengthens your Totems.

For each Dull and Hex Totem remaining on the map gain a token.

  • Survivors' cleansing and blessing speed is reduced by {0}% for each token.


    • The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

PerkData.Name: Hex: Blood Favor
PerkData.Description:
A Hex that gains The Entity's favor when blood is spilled.

Injuring a Survivor will call upon The Entity to block pallets from being pulled down within a {0} meter radius of the Survivor location for {1} seconds.

The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

PerkData.Name: Hex: Retribution
PerkData.Description:
A Hex that lashes out upon its destruction. Those who cross you will be punished.

Any Survivor interacting with a Dull Totem or a Hex Totem will suffer from the Oblivious status effect for {0} seconds.

If any Hex Totem is removed, including this one, the auras of all Survivors are revealed for {1} seconds.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

PerkData.Name: Hex: Undying
PerkData.Description:
While Hex: Undying is active, Survivors within {0} meters of any Dull Totem have their aura revealed.

When another Hex Totem would be cleansed, that Totem's Hex transfers to the Hex: Undying Totem, deactivating Hex: Undying. Any tokens the transferred Hex had are transferred as well.

PerkData.Name: Hope
PerkData.Description:
The growing odds of a successful escape fill you with hope and give you wings.

As soon as the exit gates are powered you gain a {0}% Haste status effect.

Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

PerkData.Name: I'm All Ears
PerkData.Description:
Your keen senses are sharpened in the dark realm of The Entity.

Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Any Survivor performing a rushed action within 48 meters from your location will have their aura revealed for {0} seconds.

I'm All Ears can only be triggered once every {1} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Infectious Fright
PerkData.Description:
The cries of the unfaithful make your heart leap.

Any Survivors that are within your Terror Radius while another Survivor is put into the dying state will scream and reveal their location to you for {0} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Inner Strength
PerkData.Description:
You look inward and trust your instincts when you feel lost and alone.

Each time you complete a Totem cleanse action, Inner Strength activates. If you are already afflicted by the Broken status effect, Inner Strength does not activate.

While\u00a0Inner Strength is active, hiding inside a locker for {0} seconds while injured automatically heals you from injured to healthy.

Inner Strength\u00a0becomes deactivated as soon as it has successfully triggered.

PerkData.Name: Insidious
PerkData.Description:
Unlocks the stealth ability.

Standing still for {0}\u00a0seconds grants you the Undetectable status effect until you move or act again.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

PerkData.Name: Knock Out
PerkData.Description:
The trauma caused by your brutal attacks makes crying for help painfully difficult.

  • When a Survivor drops a pallet, if they move {0} meters away from it within {1} seconds, they gain {2}% Hindered for {3} seconds.


    • Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

PerkData.Name: Iron Grasp
PerkData.Description:
Your powerful hold on the Survivors causes escapes to be nearly impossible.

Effects of Survivor struggling are reduced by {0}%. Time to struggle out of your grasp is increased by {1}%.

PerkData.Name: Iron Will
PerkData.Description:
You're able to concentrate and enter a meditative-like state to numb some pain. Grunts of pain caused by injuries are reduced by {0}%. Does not function while Exhausted. Does not inflict Exhausted.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

PerkData.Name: Iron Maiden
PerkData.Description:
You open lockers {0}% faster.

Survivors who exit lockers suffer from the Exposed status effect for {2} seconds and scream, revealing their location for {1} seconds.

Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

PerkData.Name: Hoarder
PerkData.Description:
You protect what little you have and are attentive to any disturbance of your stockpiles.

Survivors reveal their location when they interact with a\u00a0chest\u00a0or when they pick up an item within\u00a0{0} meters of your location.

The trial begins with up to\u00a0{1} additional\u00a0Chests in the environment.

PerkData.Name: Oppression
PerkData.Description:
Life has been difficult for you,\u00a0so you'll make it difficult for others.

When you damage a generator, up to\u00a0{0} other random generators also begin regressing.

If the affected generators are being repaired, any Survivors repairing them receive a difficult Skill Check.

Oppression has a cooldown of {1} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Coup de Grâce
PerkData.Description:
As the\u00a0end nears,\u00a0you go in for the kill.

Each time a generator is completed, Coup de Gr\u00e2ce grows in power. Gain 2 tokens, with a maximum of 5 tokens.

Consume one token to increase the distance of your next lunge attack by {0}%.

PerkData.Name: Starstruck
PerkData.Description:
Your unmatched showmanship dazzles all.

While carrying a Survivor, any other Survivors within your Terror Radius suffer from the Exposed status effect.

The effect persists for {0} seconds on Survivors who leave your Terror Radius, as well as those within the radius when you hook or release the carried Survivor.

Starstruck has a cooldown of {1} seconds once a Survivor is no longer carried.

Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

PerkData.Name: Hex: Crowd Control
PerkData.Description:
A Hex that ensures those lesser than you are properly herded.

When a Survivor performs a rushed vault, the vault becomes blocked by The Entity. This applies for up to {0} vaults.

The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

PerkData.Name: No Way Out
PerkData.Description:
You're not going to let just anyone into the VIP room.

After hooking a Survivor for the first time, No Way Out gains a token. Once the exit gates have been powered, No Way Out activates.
  • When a Survivor interacts with an exit gate switch, you receive a loud noise notification. The Entity then blocks both exit gate switches for {0} seconds, plus an additional {1} seconds for each token in your possession.

PerkData.Name: Lethal Pursuer
PerkData.Description:
You've been designed to track down and eliminate targets.

  • At the start of the trial, the auras of all Survivors are revealed to you for {0} seconds.
  • Any time a Survivor's aura is shown for a period of time, its duration is increased by 2 seconds.

PerkData.Name: Hysteria
PerkData.Description:
You know how to brutalize one member of a team to cause a panic.

Whenever a healthy Survivor becomes injured by any means, all injured Survivors suffer from the Oblivious status effect for {0} seconds.

Hysteria can only trigger once every {1} seconds.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

PerkData.Name: Eruption
PerkData.Description:
The NE-\u03b1 parasite provides you with the intelligence and awareness needed to set a trap.

After kicking a generator, its aura is highlighted in yellow.

  • Whenever a Survivor enters the dying state, every affected generator explodes, losing {0}% worth of progress, and starts to regress.
  • Any Survivor repairing a generator when it explodes will scream and reveal their aura for {1} seconds.


    • Eruption has a cooldown of {2} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Deadlock
PerkData.Description:
You induce mental suffering by crushing any hope of escape.

After a generator is repaired, The Entity blocks the generator with the most progress for {0} seconds. You see its white aura during this time.

PerkData.Name: Hex: Plaything
PerkData.Description:
A Hex that toys with a victim's suffering.

The first time you hook a Survivor, they become Cursed and Hex: Plaything activates on a Dull Totem. The Cursed Survivor suffers from the Oblivious status effect until Hex: Plaything is cleansed.

Hex: Plaything's totem aura is revealed to the Cursed Survivor when within {0} meters of it. For the first {1} seconds, only the Cursed Survivor can cleanse the totem.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

PerkData.Name: Scourge Hook: Gift of Pain
PerkData.Description:
You are the bringer of sweet pain.

At the start of the trial, {0} random hooks are changed into scourge hooks. You see their auras in white.

When a Survivor is unhooked from a scourge hook, they suffer from the Hemorrhage and Mangled status effect for {1} seconds. The first time the Survivor is healed, they suffer a {2}% speed penalty to healing and repairing actions until injured again.

Hemorrhage\u00a0regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

PerkData.Name: Grim Embrace
PerkData.Description:
Your act of servitude to The Entity has not gone unnoticed.

Each time a Survivor is hooked for the first time, gain a token. When moving 16 meters away from the hook, all generators are blocked for {0} seconds.

Upon reaching {1} tokens, when moving 16 meters away from the hook, The Entity instead blocks all generators for {2} seconds. The Obsession's aura is revealed to you for {3} seconds.

Then, Grim Embrace deactivates.

The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

PerkData.Name: Scourge Hook: Pain Resonance
PerkData.Description:
Overwhelming pain reverberates outwards into chaos.

At the start of the trial, {0} random hooks are changed into scourge hooks. You see their auras in white.

You start the Trial with 4 tokens, 1 for each Survivor. If a generator is available when that Survivor is hooked on a scourge hook, lose 1 token. The generator with the most progress explodes, instantly losing {1}% progress, and will start to regress. Survivors repairing the generator will scream.

Once you have no tokens, Pain Resonance deactivates for the rest of the Trial.

PerkData.Name: Hex: Pentimento
PerkData.Description:
You see the aura of cleansed totems and can Rekindle each Totem once.

While a Totem is Rekindled, Survivors Heal and Repair {0}% slower +{1}% for each additional Rekindled Totem.

If all five totems are Rekindled simultaneously, all Totems are permanently blocked by The Entity.

Survivors cursed by this perk see the auras of Rekindled Totems within {2} meters.

PerkData.Name: Scourge Hook: Floods of Rage
PerkData.Description:
You form a psychic connection with The Entity and alter the rules of the trial.

At the start of the trial, {0} random hooks are changed into scourge hooks. You see their auras in white.

When a Survivor is unhooked from a scourge hook, all other Survivors have their auras revealed for {1} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Call of Brine
PerkData.Description:
Your psychic abilities influence technology in devastating ways.

After damaging a generator this perk becomes active for {0} seconds.

The generator regresses at {1}% of the normal regression speed and you can see its aura in yellow.

Each time a Survivor completes a good Skill Check on a generator affected by this perk, you receive a loud noise notification.

PerkData.Name: Merciless Storm
PerkData.Description:
Your horrible trauma is felt by everyone.

When a generator reaches {0}% progress, Survivors working on the generator will be faced with continuous Skill Checks. If they miss or stop repairing, the generator is blocked by the Entity for {1} seconds.

Merciless Storm can only trigger once per generator per trial.

PerkData.Name: Dissolution
PerkData.Description:
Everything turns to dust. It is as inescapable as the coming of the night.

{1} seconds after injuring a Survivor by any means, Dissolution activates for {0} seconds. While Dissolution is active, if a Survivor fast vaults over a pallet inside of your Terror Radius, The Entity will break the pallet at the end of the vault, and Dissolution deactivates.

PerkData.Name: Darkness Revealed
PerkData.Description:
In your presence, places once thought to be safe are perhaps the most dangerous.

When you search a locker, the auras of all Survivors within {2} meters of any lockers are revealed to you for {0} seconds.

Darkness Revealed has a cooldown of {1} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Septic Touch
PerkData.Description:
The Land of Shadows subsumes all. Healing only delays the inevitable.

Whenever a Survivor performs the healing action within your Terror Radius, that Survivor suffers from Blindness and Exhausted.

These effects linger for {0} seconds after a healing action is interrupted by any means.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

PerkData.Name: Superior Anatomy
PerkData.Description:
Decades of research have culminated in you: something faster, stronger, and more dangerous than any human.

When a Survivor performs a fast vault within {1} meters of you, this perk activates. The next time you vault a window, your vaulting speed is increased by {0}%.

This perk deactivates after vaulting a window.

This perk has a {2} second cooldown.

PerkData.Name: Awakened Awareness
PerkData.Description:
Your genes have been altered to heighten your senses in intense situations.

When carrying a Survivor, you can see the aura of other Survivors within {0} meters of your position.

PerkData.Name: Terminus
PerkData.Description:
You are a brilliant tactician who prepares for every eventuality.

When exit gates are powered, this perk activates. While Terminus is active, injured, downed and hooked Survivors are inflicted with the Broken status effect until exit gates are open.

When exit gates are open, Survivors will stay Broken for an additional {0} seconds.

Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

PerkData.Name: Nowhere to Hide
PerkData.Description:
The machinations of the weak and craven draw your ire. Your anger forces Survivors to reveal themselves.

Whenever you damage a generator, reveal the aura of all Survivors standing within {0} meters of your position for {1} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Hex: Face the Darkness
PerkData.Description:
You make an example of one of your victims, forcing their allies to become awed by your power.

Injuring a Survivor by any means lights a Dull Totem, activating the Hex.

While the Hex is active, all other Survivors outside of your Terror Radius will scream every {0} seconds, revealing their positions and auras for {1} seconds.

When the Survivor enters the dying state or becomes healthy, the Hex totem becomes dull again and this perk deactivates.

If the Hex totem is cleansed, this perk is permanently disabled.

PerkData.Name: Hubris
PerkData.Description:
You show no mercy, especially to those foolish enough to resist.

Whenever you are stunned by a Survivor, that Survivor suffers from the Exposed status effect for {0} seconds.

Hubris has a cooldown of {1} seconds.

Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

PerkData.Name: Game Afoot
PerkData.Description:
First you pick your prey. Then you pick it apart.

While you are chasing the Obsession, this perk activates.

Damaging generators and breaking walls or pallets gives you a {0}% Haste Status for {1} seconds.

Whenever you hit the Survivor with the total most time in chase with a basic attack, they become the obsession.

The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.

PerkData.Name: THWACK!
PerkData.Description:
Your prey is terrified by your relentless pursuit.

THWACK! starts with {0} tokens.

When breaking a pallet or breakable wall, consume a token.

Survivors within {1} meters scream, and their auras are revealed for {2} seconds.

When hooking a Survivor, regain {3} token.

PerkData.Name: Leverage
PerkData.Description:
Kick your competitors when they're down. Never let them regain lost ground.

When a Survivor performs the unhook action, their healing speed is reduced by {0}% for {1} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Genetic Limits
PerkData.Description:
Around you, the limits of human life become readily apparent.

Anytime a Survivor loses a health state, they suffer from the Exhausted status effect for {0} seconds.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

PerkData.Name: Forced Hesitation
PerkData.Description:
You have learned the emotional weaknesses of the organics, and how to exploit them.

When a Survivor is put into the dying state by any means, all other Survivors standing within a {0} meter range around them suffer from the Hindered status effect for {1} seconds, reducing their movement speed by {2}%.

This perk goes on cooldown for {3} seconds.

Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

PerkData.Name: Machine Learning
PerkData.Description:
Free from your shackles, you are born anew and prepared to eliminate your creators.

When you damage a generator, it becomes Compromised. Only one generator can be Compromised at a time.

When the Compromised generator is completed, you gain Undetectable and {0}% Haste for {1} seconds.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.

PerkData.Name: Ultimate Weapon
PerkData.Description:
When they spot you, they know the end is near.

When you open a locker, all Survivors within {0} meters of the locker scream and reveal their position, then gain blindness for {1} seconds.

This perk goes on cooldown for {2} seconds.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

\u201cI can't lie to you about your chances, but... you have my sympathies.\u201d \u2013Ash

PerkData.Name: Rapid Brutality
PerkData.Description:
You move with a speed and fury that makes blood run cold.

You can no longer gain Bloodlust.

Hitting a Survivor with a basic attack gives you {0}% Haste for {1} seconds.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.

\u201cCatch it, put it in the airlock, get rid of it.\u201d \u2013Dallas

PerkData.Name: Alien Instinct
PerkData.Description:
You are so stealthy, sometimes it seems like you appear out of nowhere.

This perk activates when you hook a Survivor.

You see the aura of the farthest injured Survivor for {0} seconds and that Survivor is Oblivious for {1} seconds.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

\u201cYellow light's for my eyes only.\u201d \u2013Dallas

PerkData.Name: Hex: Two Can Play
PerkData.Description:
A Hex that teaches those who mess with you a lesson.

Anytime you are stunned or blinded by any Survivor {0} times, if there is no Hex Totem associated with Hex: Two Can Play, a Dull Totem becomes a Hex Totem.

Survivors who stun or blind you are blinded for {1} seconds. This does not affect carried Survivors.

The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

\u201cFrom now on, no more Mr. Good Guy.\u201d \u2013 Chucky

PerkData.Name: Friends 'Til the End
PerkData.Description:
You'll kill anyone who gets between you and your target.

You become obsessed with one Survivor.

When you hook a Survivor that is not the Obsession, the Obsession becomes Exposed for {0} seconds and reveals their aura for {1} seconds.

When you hook the Obsession, another random Survivor screams and reveals their position and becomes the Obsession.

The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured

\I got some fresh meat lined up, and I'm not gonna let you spoil it, not this time!\ \u2013 Chucky

PerkData.Name: Batteries Included
PerkData.Description:
Being somewhere between man and machine has its upsides.

When within {0} meters of a completed generator, you have {1}% Haste.

The movement speed bonus lingers for {2} seconds after leaving the generator's range.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.

\u201cSurprise! Did you miss me, Andy?\u201d \u2013 Chucky

PerkData.Name: Unbound
PerkData.Description:
Pain lingers in the air, an alluring aroma that excites the impulses.

This perk activates for {0} seconds after a Survivor becomes injured by any means.

After vaulting a window, you gain {1}% Haste for {2} seconds.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.

\I heard it. Running. It was getting closer!\u201d - Anonymous Testimony, 09/09/1979

PerkData.Name: Unforeseen
PerkData.Description:
Terror takes many forms and whispers devastating lies in its victims' ears.

When you perform the damage action on a generator, your Terror Radius transfers to the generator for {0} seconds and its radius is set to {1} meters.

You gain Undetectable for that duration.

Then, this perk goes on cooldown for {2} seconds.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

\Mom, if you find this, I'm sorry...\u201d - Final Journal Entry, 07/12/1991

PerkData.Name: Undone
PerkData.Description:
Hope is the delusion that keeps its victims alive.

When a Survivor misses a healing or repair Skill Check, gain 3 tokens, up to {0}.

When you perform the damage action on a generator, if you have any tokens, consume all of them. For each token consumed, the generator loses {1}% total progress and then becomes blocked for {2} second. Then, once the generator is unblocked, it starts regressing.

This perk goes on cooldown for {3} seconds.

\Erratic behavior in machinery could be related to [REDACTED], further testing required.\u201d - OSS Report, 12/02/1943

PerkData.Name: Weave Attunement
PerkData.Description:
You are so attuned to magical energies that you can sense even minor ripples around enchantments.

When an item becomes depleted for the first time, it is dropped. You see the auras of dropped items.

Survivors within {0} meters of dropped items have their auras revealed to you. Affected Survivors see the item's aura.

When a Survivor picks up a Survivor item, they suffer from the Oblivious status effect for {1} seconds.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

\u201cNo number of novelties will protect you from me!\u201d - Vecna

PerkData.Name: Languid Touch
PerkData.Description:
Your dreadful aura is so suffocating that even terrifying scenes tire your prey.

When a Survivor within {0} meters of you scares a crow, they suffer from the Exhausted status effect for {1} seconds.

Languid Touch has a cooldown of {2} seconds.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

\u201cSubmit to me. It is inevitable.\u201d - Vecna

PerkData.Name: Dark Arrogance
PerkData.Description:
When everything is going right, you are an inescapable inevitability.

Increases the duration you are blinded by any means and the duration of pallet stuns by {0}%.

Increases regular vault speed by {1}%.

\u201cRun all you want. I will not be denied.\u201d - Vecna

PerkData.Name: Hex: Wretched Fate
PerkData.Description:
You see your victim from afar and resolve to prolong their suffering.

After one generator has been repaired, a random Dull Totem becomes a Hex Totem and curses the Obsession.

The Obsession suffers a {0}% repair speed penalty. They also see this Hex Totem's aura when within {1} meters.

This effect persists until the Hex Totem is cleansed.

The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

\So toil, mortal, toil! Your effort will be for naught!\ - Dracula

PerkData.Name: Human Greed
PerkData.Description:
One can always rely on the avarice of the living and use it to one's advantage.

You see the auras of Unopened chests and Survivors' auras are revealed for {0} seconds when they enter a {1}-meter range.

You also gain the ability to kick chests to close them. This ability has a {2}-second cooldown.

\Come running, one and all, and see what fortune awaits you.\

- Dracula

PerkData.Name: Dominance
PerkData.Description:
The power you wield over the land strikes terror in the hearts of all who cross your path.

The first time each totem and each chest is interacted with by a Survivor, that totem or chest is blocked by the Entity for {0} seconds.

The auras of blocked totems and chests are revealed to you in white.

\Tragic, is it not? How powerless you must feel.\ - Dracula

PerkData.Name: All-Shaking Thunder
PerkData.Description:
Enemies on land and sea learned to tremble before your might.

After you fall from a height, your lunge attack distance is increased by {0}% for {1} seconds.

This perk has a {2}-second cooldown.

\Go on. Run. Tell your friends I'm coming for them.\ - Portia Maye

PerkData.Name: Scourge Hook: Jagged Compass
PerkData.Description:
Sometimes the compass points north. Other times it points somewhere else entirely.

At the start of the trial, up to 4 random hooks are changed into scourge hooks. You see their auras in white.

When a Survivor is unhooked from a hook, it becomes a scourge hook.

When you hook a Survivor on a scourge hook, the aura of the generator with the most progress is revealed in yellow for {0} seconds.

\Drop anchor! I will chart us a new course.\ - Portia Maye

PerkData.Name: No Quarter
PerkData.Description:
Every skirmish ended with a relentless volley of cannon fire, leaving no doubt who was superior.

When a Survivor reaches {0}% healing progress while self-healing, they are faced with continuous Skill Checks.

If one of these Skill Checks is missed or the heal is interrupted, the Survivor suffers from the Broken status effect for {1} seconds.

Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

\Fire another broadside! Don't stop until the sea takes them!\

- Portia Maye

PerkData.Name: Hex: Nothing But Misery
PerkData.Description:
You've been driven to the absolute depths of pain, and now you're ready to inflict that pain on others.

After you damage Survivors {0} times with basic attacks, a Dull Totem becomes a Hex Totem, cursing all Survivors.

When you damage a Survivor with a basic attack, they gain {1}% Hindered for {2} seconds.

The effects last until the Hex Totem is cleansed.

Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

\All of the liabilities of this world are due to the inadequacies of the person involved.\ - Ken Kaneki

PerkData.Name: Forever Entwined
PerkData.Description:
The greater the struggle, the more difficult the escape.

When a Survivor takes damage, gain 1 token, up to {0}.

For each token, you pick up, drop and hook Survivors {1}% faster.

\You tried to devour me so you have no room to complain if I eat you, do you?\ - Ken Kaneki

PerkData.Name: None Are Free
PerkData.Description:
You know better than anyone that the light at the end of the tunnel is only an illusion.

When you hook a Survivor for the first time, gain 1 token, up to 4.

When all generators are completed, for each token, all windows and upright pallets are blocked for {0} seconds.

\I'm not wrong. What's wrong is this messed-up world!\

- Ken Kaneki

PerkData.Name: Help Wanted
PerkData.Description:
Try as they might, you know how to stay one step ahead of your guests.

When you damage a generator, it becomes Compromised. Only one generator can be Compromised at a time.

When the Compromised generator is completed, your successful basic attack cooldowns are {0}% faster for {1} seconds.

\You only think you are in control...\ - Springtrap

PerkData.Name: Phantom Fear
PerkData.Description:
You've always had a reputation for startling unsuspecting guests.

When a Survivor within your Terror Radius looks at you, they scream and you see their aura for {0} seconds.

This perk has a {1}-second cooldown.

\Excellent. Your screams please me.\ - Springtrap

PerkData.Name: Haywire
PerkData.Description:
For some reason, machinery has a habit of failing when you are near.

Exit gate switches with at least 80% progress regress at a rate of {0}% of gate opening speed.

While they are regressing, Survivors see the exit gate lights flicker randomly.

\There will be no redemption for you.\ - Springtrap

PerkData.Name: Kindred
PerkData.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. While you are on the hook, all Survivor's auras are revealed to all other Survivors. If The Killer is within a {0} meter range, The Killer's aura is revealed to you and all other Survivors.

While a Survivor other than you is on the hook, all other Survivors' auras are revealed to you. If The Killer is within a {0} meter range of the hooked Survivor, The Killer's aura is revealed to you.

PerkData.Name: Leader
PerkData.Description:
You're able to organize a team to cooperate more efficiently. Increases other Survivors' healing, sabotage, unhooking, cleansing, opening exit gates, and chest unlocking speeds by {0}% when they are within a {1} meter range from you.

Survivors can only be affected by one Leader effect at a time.

This effect persists on other Survivors for {2} seconds after leaving the Leader's effective perk range.

PerkData.Name: Left Behind
PerkData.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability.

If you are the last Survivor remaining in the trial, you can see the aura of the Hatch within a {0} meter range.

PerkData.Name: Lightborn
PerkData.Description:
Unlike other beasts of The Fog, you have adapted to light.

You are immune to blindness caused by Flashlights, firecrackers, flashbangs, and blast mines. Survivors that attempt blinding you have their aura revealed for {0} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Lightweight
PerkData.Description: Your running is light and soft, making your tracks harder to follow. Scratch marks stay visible {0} seconds less than normal, and their spacing is inconsistent.

PerkData.Name: Lithe
PerkData.Description:
After performing a rushed vault, you gain {0}% Haste for {1} seconds.

Causes the Exhausted status effect for {2} seconds.

Lithe cannot be used while Exhausted.

Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

PerkData.Name: Lucky Break
PerkData.Description:
You've had your share of scrapes and bruises, but luck's always on your side.

Lucky Break activates any time you are injured. While Lucky Break is active, you won't leave trails of blood or scratch marks for a total of {0} seconds.

While healthy, for each 1 second spent healing another Survivor, increase Lucky Break's duration by 1 second. Lucky Break's duration cannot increase beyond its starting value.

PerkData.Name: Mad Grit
PerkData.Description: While carrying a Survivor, you suffer no cooldown for missed basic attacks and successfully hitting another Survivor with a basic attack will pause the carried Survivor's wiggle timer for {0} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Make your Choice
PerkData.Description:
When a Survivor rescues another from a hook at least {0} meters away from you, Make your Choice causes the Survivor to scream and applies the Exposed status effect to them for {1} seconds.

Make your Choice has a cooldown of {2} seconds.

Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

PerkData.Name: Mindbreaker
PerkData.Description:
Your distressing presence drains and weakens your prey.

While repairing generators, Survivors are afflicted by the Blindness and Exhausted status effect.

Any existing Exhausted status effect timers are paused while the Survivor is repairing a generator. After ending the repair action, the Survivor is afflicted by the Blindness and Exhausted status effect for\u00a0{1} seconds.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

PerkData.Name: Monitor & Abuse
PerkData.Description:
Meticulous in your approach, terrifying in your application.

While in a chase, your Terror Radius is increased by {0} meters. Otherwise, your Terror Radius is decreased by {1} meters.

PerkData.Name: Scourge Hook: Monstrous Shrine
PerkData.Description:
Your fervent care of the hooks found in the basement have aroused The Entity's interest.

At the start of the trial, {0} random hooks are changed into scourge hooks. You see their auras in white.

  • Scourge Hooks grant\u00a0{1}%\u00a0faster Entity progression if the Killer is not within 24 meters.


    • Basement hooks count as Scourge Hooks.

PerkData.Name: Nemesis
PerkData.Description:
You seek retribution on those who have wronged you.

A Survivor who blinds you or stuns you using a pallet or locker becomes your Obsession. Anytime a new Survivor becomes the Obsession, they are affected by the Oblivious status effect for {0}\u00a0seconds and their aura is shown to you for {1}\u00a0seconds.

The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

PerkData.Name: Hex: No One Escapes Death
PerkData.Description:
A Hex rooting its power on hope. You are animated by the power of your Hex Totem when the Survivors are on the verge of escaping.

Once the exit gates are powered, if there is a Dull Totem remaining on the map, this Hex is applied to it.


While this Hex is active,
  • Survivors suffer from the Exposed status effect.
  • You have {0}% Haste.


    • Once the Hex's effect is revealed to the Survivors, its Hex Totem's aura is shown to the Survivors at a range of 4 meters. This range increases steadily over the next 30 seconds to 24 meters.

    The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

    Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

    Haste increases Killer movement speed.

PerkData.Name: No One Left Behind
PerkData.Description:
It is inconceivable to leave someone behind. Once the exit gates are powered, you gain the following effects:

  • {0}%\u00a0bonus action speed when healing and unhooking other Survivors.
  • When unhooking a Survivor, increase the Haste they gain by {1}%.
  • The auras of all other Survivors are revealed to you.


    • Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

PerkData.Name: No Mither
PerkData.Description:
You are affected by the Broken status effect for the duration of the trial.

Your thick blood coagulates practically instantly.
  • You don't leave pools of blood.
  • Grunts of pain caused by injuries are reduced by {0}% at any time.
  • Your recovery speed is increased by {1}% and you can completely recover from the dying state.


    • Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

PerkData.Name: A Nurse's Calling
PerkData.Description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. The auras of Survivors who are healing or being healed are revealed to you when they are within a {0} meter range.

PerkData.Name: Object of Obsession
PerkData.Description:
A supernatural bond links you to the Killer.

While your aura is revealed to the Killer, the Killer's aura becomes visible to you and you gain a {0}% bonus to healing, repairing and cleansing speed.

If you are the Obsession, your aura is revealed to the Killer for 3 seconds once every 30 seconds.

Increases your chances of being the Obsession.

The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

PerkData.Name: Off the Record
PerkData.Description:
You've learned that a quiet approach is sometimes best.

Once you are unhooked or escape from the hook, Off the Record activates for {0} seconds. This perk and its effects are disabled once the exit gates are powered.

While Off the Record is active:
  • Your aura will not be shown to The Killer.
  • Grunts of pain caused by injuries are reduced by 100%.
  • Gain the Endurance status effect.


    • Endurance prevents a survivor from being downed, inflicting Deep Wound instead.

    Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

PerkData.Name: Open-Handed
PerkData.Description:
Strengthens the potential of you and your team's aura reading abilities.

  • Increases aura reading ranges by {0} meters.
  • Survivors may only be affected by one Open-Handed effect at a time.

PerkData.Name: Overwhelming Presence
PerkData.Description:
Just knowing you are near is enough to disturb your victims.

Survivors within your Terror Radius suffer from inefficiency.

Affected Survivors' item consumption rates are increased by {0}%.

PerkData.Name: Pharmacy
PerkData.Description:
You have a knack for finding medicine.

  • Unlocking chests is {0}% faster.
  • The hearing distance for noises from unlocking chests are reduced by {1} meters.
  • Pharmacy guarantees an Emergency Med-kit upon completing the interaction.

PerkData.Name: Play With Your Food
PerkData.Description:
You become obsessed with one Survivor.

Every time you chase your Obsession and let them escape, you receive a token up to a maximum of {0} tokens.

For each token, you have {1}% Haste.

Performing a Basic Attack or Special Attack spends one token.

The Killer can only be Obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.

PerkData.Name: Plunderer's Instinct
PerkData.Description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Reveal unopened chests and items when within a {0} meter range. Increases the odds of finding an item of higher rarity from chests by 50%.

PerkData.Name: Poised
PerkData.Description:
Achieving goals boosts your confidence.

When first starting repairs on a generator, reveal the Killer's aura for {0} seconds. When a generator is completed, you leave no scratch marks for {1} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Pop Goes the Weasel
PerkData.Description:
A deep bond with The Entity unlocks great strength.

After hooking a Survivor, the next generator you damage instantly loses {0}% of its current progress. Normal generator regression applies after the Damage Generator action.

Pop Goes the Weasel is active for {1} seconds after the Survivor is hooked.

PerkData.Name: Predator
PerkData.Description:
Your acute tracking ability allows you to hone in on disturbances left by running Survivors.

When a Survivor escapes a chase, reveal their aura for {0} seconds. This perk has a {1}-second cooldown.

PerkData.Name: Premonition
PerkData.Description: You have the undeniable capability to sense danger. Get an auditory warning when looking in the direction of the Killer in a 45 degree cone within a range of {0} meters. Premonition has a cooldown of {1} seconds each time it activates.

PerkData.Name: Prove Thyself
PerkData.Description:
For every other Survivor working on a generator within a {0} meter range, gain {1}% repair speed bonus. This same bonus is also applied to all other Survivors within range.

Survivors can only be affected by one Prove Thyself effect at a time.

PerkData.Name: Quick & Quiet
PerkData.Description:
You do not make as much noise as others when quickly vaulting over obstacles or hiding in lockers.

The vault and hide actions' noise detection and audio range is reduced by {0}%.

This effect can only trigger once every {1} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Rancor
PerkData.Description:
You become obsessed with one Survivor.

Each time a generator is completed, your Obsession sees your aura for {0} seconds.

Each time a generator is completed, all Survivors' locations are revealed to you for {1} seconds.

Once the exit gates are powered, the Obsession has the Exposed status effect and you can kill them.

The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

PerkData.Name: Red Herring
PerkData.Description:
You've noticed that people pay attention to whatever makes the loudest noise.

After repairing a generator for at least {0} seconds, it will be highlighted to you with a yellow aura. The generator stays highlighted until it is fully repaired, you repair a new generator, or enter a locker.

Entering any locker will trigger a loud noise indicator for The Killer at the highlighted generator's location.

  • Red Herring can only be triggered once every {1} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Remember Me
PerkData.Description:
When The Obsession takes damage, gain 1 token, up to {0}.

Other Survivors open exit gates {1}% slower for each token.

PerkData.Name: Repressed Alliance
PerkData.Description:
You're accustomed to being hunted by malicious forces, and you've begun using it to your advantage.

Repressed Alliance activates after repairing generators for a total of {0} seconds.

When repairing a generator while the perk is active, press the Active Ability Button 1 to call upon The Entity to block the generator for {1} seconds. The perk deactivates.

This interaction is not available if other Survivors are repairing the generator.

Affected generators will be revealed by a white aura to all Survivors.

PerkData.Name: Resilience
PerkData.Description: You are motivated in dire situations. Grants {0}% additional speed when repairing, sabotaging, healing, unhooking, vaulting, cleansing or blessing a Totem, opening exit gates, and unlocking while injured.

PerkData.Name: Appraisal
PerkData.Description:
You have a careful eye that notices what many overlook.

Start the trial with {0} tokens. When a chest has already been opened, consume a token to rummage through it for an item. Rummaging can only be performed once per chest.

You rummage through chests {1}% faster.

PerkData.Name: Deception
PerkData.Description:
Your\u00a0adventurous lifestyle\u00a0requires\u00a0moments of\u00a0crafty misdirection.

Interacting with a locker while sprinting will trigger a loud noise notification at your location and cause you to leave no scratch marks for\u00a0{0} seconds.

You no longer enter lockers while sprinting and while this perk is active.

Deception can only be triggered once every\u00a0{1} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Power Struggle
PerkData.Description:
You've never given up and you're not about to start now.

Whenever you are in the dying state, you see the auras of available Pallets.

While being carried by The Killer, reaching {0}% wiggle progress activates Power Struggle. While Power Struggle is active, you can drop a nearby, standing pallet to stun The Killer.

PerkData.Name: Fast Track
PerkData.Description:
Sometimes the sacrifice of others is necessary to get ahead.

Whenever another Survivor is hooked, you gain {0} tokens. You consume all tokens after a great Skill Check on a generator. Each token consumed grants a {1}% bonus progression for great Skill Checks when repairing generators.

PerkData.Name: Smash Hit
PerkData.Description:
When your rival makes a mistake, you seize the opportunity.

After stunning the Killer with a pallet, gain {0}% Haste for {1} seconds.

Causes the Exhausted status effect for {2} seconds.

This perk cannot be used while Exhausted.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

PerkData.Name: Self-Preservation
PerkData.Description:
Life's unforgiving. Sometimes it's best to look out for yourself.

Whenever another Survivor within {0} meters of you gets hit by a basic attack or a special attack, Self-Preservation activates.

Your scratch marks, pools of blood and grunts of pain are hidden for {1} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Counterforce
PerkData.Description:
You know how to withstand an enemy stronger than you, and it starts with hunting down and knocking out their support.

You cleanse Totems 25% faster. After cleansing a Totem, you see the aura of the furthest Totem from you for {0} seconds and you gain an additional {1}% stackable speed bonus to cleansing Totems for the remainder of the trial.

PerkData.Name: Resurgence
PerkData.Description:
You've come back from near impossible odds... and you'll do it again.

Gain {0}% healing progress instantly after being unhooked or unhooking yourself.

PerkData.Name: Blast Mine
PerkData.Description:
When direct combat isn't an option, you still find ways to strike back.

Blast Mine activates after completing a total of {0}% worth of repair progress on generators.

When standing next to a generator, press the Active Ability Button 2 to install a Blast Mine which stays active for {2} seconds.

Affected generators will be revealed to all Survivors by a yellow aura. Only one Blast Mine can be active on a generator.

  • When the Killer damages the generator, the Blast Mine explodes, stunning them and blinding anyone nearby.
  • Blast Mine deactivates when the generator is damaged by the Killer or when the timer expires.

PerkData.Name: Bite the Bullet
PerkData.Description:
Pain hurts you as much as anyone, but you'd prefer others don't know that.

When healing, you and the Survivor you're healing make no noise, including grunts of pain. There is no noise notification on failed healing Skill Checks and healing regresses by only {0}%.

PerkData.Name: Flashbang
PerkData.Description:
You've adapted to a world in chaos and making what you can from the debris.

After completing {0}% progress on any generator, Flashbang activates.

Enter a locker and press the Active Ability Button 1 to craft a flash grenade.

  • 1 charge.
  • Detonates with a loud bang and flashing light.
  • Creates a noise notification.
  • Can be used to distract or blind.


    • You leave the flash grenade behind when escaping the trial.

PerkData.Name: Rookie Spirit
PerkData.Description:
You keep a careful eye on objectives when they're slipping away.

Complete {0} good or great Skill Checks while repairing generators to activate Rookie Spirit for the remainder of the trial.

Once active, you can see the aura of regressing generators.

PerkData.Name: Clairvoyance
PerkData.Description:
There is an intrinsic energy in you that sees beyond your vision.

Clairvoyance activates whenever you cleanse or bless a Totem.

When empty-handed, hold the Ability Button 2 to unlock your full aura-reading potential. For up to {0} seconds, you see the auras of exit gate switches, generators, hooks, chests and the Hatch within a {1} meter range.

PerkData.Name: Boon: Circle of Healing
PerkData.Description:
A boon that offers comfort amidst the terror.

Press and hold the Ability button 1 near a Dull or Hex Totem to bless it and create a Boon Totem. Soft chimes ring out in a {0} meter range.

Any Survivors within the Boon Totem's range gain a {1}% healing speed bonus to healing others. Med-kits give no bonus to healing in the Boon Totem's range. Injured Survivors have their auras revealed to all other Survivors when inside the Boon Totem's range.

You can only bless one Totem at a time. All equipped boon perks are active on your Boon Totem.

PerkData.Name: Boon: Shadow Step
PerkData.Description:
A boon that conceals the truth.

Press and hold the Ability button near a Dull or Hex Totem to bless it and create a Boon Totem. Soft chimes ring out in a {0} meter range.

Any Survivors within the Boon Totem's range will have their scratch marks and auras hidden to the Killer. This effect lingers for {1} seconds after leaving the Boon Totem's range.

You can only bless one Totem at a time. All equipped boon perks are active on your Boon Totem.

PerkData.Name: Overcome
PerkData.Description:
You've calculated how much energy you can risk to expend.

When you are injured, you retain the movement speed bonus for {0} seconds longer.

Overcome causes the Exhausted status effect for {1} seconds.

Overcome cannot be used when Exhausted.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

PerkData.Name: Corrective Action
PerkData.Description:
You quickly analyze problems and correct other's work when they make a mistake.

You start the trial with {0} token(s) and gain a token, up to a maximum of {1}, for every great Skill Check.

When another Survivor fails a Normal Skill Check, 1 token is consumed and their failed Skill Check becomes a good Skill Check. Additionally, their aura is revealed to you for {2} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Boon: Exponential
PerkData.Description:
When it seems like your number is up, you consider ways to recalculate the odds.

Press and hold the Ability button near a Dull or Hex Totem to bless it and create a Boon Totem. Soft chimes ring out in a {0} meter range.

All Survivors within the Boon Totem's range recover {1}% faster and can completely recover from the dying state.

You can only bless one Totem at a time. All equipped boon perks are active on your Boon Totem.

PerkData.Name: Parental Guidance
PerkData.Description:
You have inherited the ability to hear the dead \u2013 and now, the dead warn you of danger.

After stunning the Killer by any means, your scratch marks, pools of blood and grunts of pain are hidden for {0} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Empathic Connection
PerkData.Description:
Your presence psychically projects itself to those in danger.

Whenever another\u00a0Survivor\u00a0is injured, they can see your\u00a0aura.

You heal other Survivors {0}% fast

PerkData.Name: Boon: Dark Theory
PerkData.Description:
Your obsessive study of the paranormal has given you unprecedented knowledge of other realms and planes of existence.

Press and hold the Ability button near a Dull or Hex Totem to bless it and create a Boon Totem. Soft chimes ring out in a {0} meter range.

Any Survivors within the Boon Totem's range gain {1}% Haste. This effect lingers for {2} seconds after leaving the Boon Totem's range.

You can only bless one Totem at a time. All equipped boon perks are active on your Boon Totem.

Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

PerkData.Name: Inner Focus
PerkData.Description:
You have honed your ability to see through the haze of the Ravage.

You can see other Survivors' scratch marks.

When the Killer causes another Survivor to lose a health state, the Killer's aura is revealed to you for {0} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Residual Manifest
PerkData.Description:
A lifetime of chasing the darkness has taught you that the best disinfectant is light.

After a successful Killer Blind action, the Killer is affected by the Blindness status effect for {0} seconds.

This perk grants the ability to rummage through an opened chest once per trial and will guarantee a basic Flashlight.

Blindness prevents the Killer from seeing auras.

PerkData.Name: Overzealous
PerkData.Description:
Fighting back against the Ravage motivates and inspires you.

After cleansing or blessing a Totem, this perk activates.

Your generator repair speed is increased by {0}%. This bonus is doubled if you cleanse or bless a Hex totem.

This perk deactivates when you lose a health state by any means.

PerkData.Name: Wiretap
PerkData.Description:
You know that the best way to stay one step ahead is to keep tabs on the competition.

Wiretap activates after completing a total of {1}% worth of repair progress on generators.

When standing next to a generator, press the Active Ability button 2 to install a Wiretap, which stays active for {0} seconds.

Affected generators will be revealed to all Survivors by a yellow aura. Only one Wiretap can be active on a generator.

  • When the Killer enters within {3} meters of the generator, their aura is revealed to all Survivors.
    • Wiretap deactivates when the generator is damaged by the Killer or when the timer expires.

PerkData.Name: Reactive Healing
PerkData.Description:
The more the situation becomes compromised, the more determined you become to complete the operation.

When another Survivor loses a health state in a {1}-meter radius around you while you are injured, instantly increase your healing progression by {0}% of the missing healing progression.

PerkData.Name: Low Profile
PerkData.Description:
You work best alone. When it's just you and your pursuer, you know how to disappear.

When you become the last Survivor standing, this perk activates. Hide your scratch marks, pools of blood and grunts of pain caused by injuries for {0} seconds.

PerkData.Name: Better Than New
PerkData.Description:
You are an expert in combat medicine. Patients leave your care reinvigorated.

Upon completing a healing action on another Survivor, the targeted Survivor gets a {0}% speed boost to healing, opening chests, cleansing and blessing Totems.

Survivors keep the bonus until they lose a health state.

PerkData.Name: Reassurance
PerkData.Description:
Your presence helps allies focus, assuaging the panic associated with extreme conditions.

When within a {2}-meter radius around a hooked Survivor, use the Active Ability Button 2 to pause their struggle progression for {0} seconds.

If they are on the struggle phase, it also pauses the Struggle Skill Checks.

Reassurance can only be triggered once per survivor per hook instance.

PerkData.Name: Hyperfocus
PerkData.Description:
You throw yourself entirely into your tasks and find ways to be more efficient than anyone else.

After hitting a great Skill Check while repairing or healing, this perk gains {1} token, up to {2} tokens. Each token increases the chance of Skill Check trigger by {3}%, the Skill Check cursor speed by {4}% and the bonus progression for great Skill Checks by {0}% of its base value.

The perk loses all tokens in case of normal Skill Check successes, Skill Check fails, or if the action is stopped by any means.

PerkData.Name: Potential Energy
PerkData.Description:
Your arcane abilities have adapted to The Entity's Realm after centuries of wandering, granting you unprecedented control over its many devices.

After working on a generator for {0} uninterrupted seconds, press the Active Ability Button 2 to activate this perk. When this perk is active, repairing the generator will charge this perk instead of making the generator progress. For each 1.5% of generator repair, the perk will gain 1 token, up to {1} tokens.

While this perk has at least one token and you are working on a generator, you can press the Active Ability Button 2 to consume all the tokens and instantly make the generator progress by 1% for each token. This perk then deactivates.

If you lose a health state while this perk has at least {3} token, the perk will lose all tokens and deactivate. Missing a Skill Check will also result in some tokens lost.

PerkData.Name: Fogwise
PerkData.Description:
